page.title: 01LITTLE KIMBLE - GENERAL
page.content: Little Kimble and the surrounding areas form a very rural part of South Buckinghamshire on the edge of the {Chiltern Hills.}The {population} numbers no more than{900}people living in 35 houses in the village of Little Kimble, between Clanking and Brook Farm, on the Aylesbury road (A4010); The rest live on the many farms in the area. There are 2 Public Houses but no shops or Places of Worship in this block (The Parish Church for the village is to the South, outside the block), the nearest small town being {Wendover}some 5Km away to the east. The London Midland Region railway runs through the block to{Aylesbury} but there are no stations in the block.
